熭字的基本解释

熭
wèi
曝晒：“黄帝曰：‘日中必熭，操刀必割。’”

熭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wèi］
［《廣韻》于歲切，去祭，云。］
［《廣韻》王伐切，入月，云。］
亦作“1”。
晒干；烤干。

熭字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　熭； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页681第01
【五音集韻】于劌切，音衞。【說文】暴乾火也。【玉篇】曝乾也。【前漢·賈誼傳】黃帝曰：日中必熭。　又或作彗。【六韜·守土篇】日中必彗。　又【集韻】胡桂切，音慧。又王伐切，音越。義?同。　【集韻】或作?。亦作?。

熭字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
熭字的起名意思

暂无。

Xi
Basic explanation of words
Xi
wèi
Exposure: "The Yellow Emperor said:'Japan must be closed, swordsman must be cut.'"
Xi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wèi］
["Guangyun" cuts at every year, to sacrifice, cloud. ]
["Guangyun" Wang Faqie, into the moon, cloud. ]
Also called "1".
Sun-dried; roasted to dry.
Xi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　熭; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 681 01
【Pentagram Rhyme】Yu Guqie, Yinwei. [Said the text] violently dry the fire. [Jade articles] Expose dry. [Previous Han·Jia Yi Biography] The Yellow Emperor said: Japan and China must be 熭.　Or make a comet again. [Six Secret Teachings·Shou Tu Chapter] Japan and China must come together.　[Jiyun] Hu Guiqie, Yinhui. Wang Faqie again, Yin Yue. Righteous? Same.　【Jiyun】or make?. Also for?.

Nothing.
wèi
гл.
